data.title: Jeremy Sisto and Wife Welcome Second Child
data.meta_description: Suburgatory's Jeremy Sisto and his wife, Addie Lane, welcomed their second child on March 9. Sisto tweeted the news: "Unnamed boy is healthy as is Mom. data.text:
Suburgatory's Jeremy Sisto and his wife, Addie Lane, welcomed their second child on March 9.

Sisto tweeted the news: "Unnamed boy is healthy as is Mom. Thanks for your wishes," he wrote. "Don't tell my wife I had two glasses of wine while she had an epidural."

Clueless reunion! Alicia Silverstone rolling (with the homies) to Suburgatory

In December, Sisto and Lane, who married in October 2009, announced the news that they were expecting their second child. Their daughter, Charlie-Ballerina, is 2.

On March 9, the 37-year-old actor also tweeted, "Just bought a teddy bear to give to my daughter 'from' her new-born brother. considering drizzling some placenta on it for believability."

Sisto currently stars on ABC's Suburgatory, but has also appeared in Six Feet Under and Law & Order.
